code: import React from'react';import'./navbar.css';import logo from'../../assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{text:"\u041E\u0431\u043E \u043C\u043D\u0435",href:"#about"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"training",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{text:"\u0422\u0440\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0440\u043E\u0432\u043A\u0438",href:"#training"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{text:"\u0426\u0435\u043D\u044B",href:"#contacts"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contacts",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{text:"\u041A\u043E\u043D\u0442\u0430\u043A\u0442\u043D\u044B\u0435 \u0434\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044B\u0435",href:"#contacts"})})]});}export default Navbar;function NavButton(_ref){let{text,href}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>scrollToComponent(href),children:text});}function scrollToComponent(href){const element=document.getElementById(href.substring(1));if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}}
